title: Your main opens a Pokemon gym
body:
What theme and which pokemon does he/she/them/it use.
here are the rules
can't use legendaries
can only use 1-2 pseudo legendaries(dragonite,tyranitar,salamance,metagross,garchomp,hydreigon and goodra)
last but not least the original pokemon has to be of that type so say if you were to use a gyarados on a flying type team but you mega evolved it into mega gyarados it would be a water dark type but still would be allowed.
my main is{{champion:58}}. He would specialize in ground types and he would use 
krookidile

I feel like this is obvious.
every pikachu clone in the book?
Either that or just all Pikachus.

For the sake of ease i dislike the only one typing thing, so im disregarding that... its hard to find a decent team to fit properly. 

{{champion:37}} -

Meloetta (Ace) {its not a mainstream legendary so meh}

You could switch some things around to have a mono type sound team 
noivern to a chatot
https://img.pokemondb.net/artwork/chatot.jpg

http://cdn.bulbagarden.net/upload/thumb/9/92/040Wigglytuff.png/250px-040Wigglytuff.png
and gardevoir with an audino, still mega.
https://img.pokemondb.net/artwork/audino-mega.jpg

And blamo, you are in business with a mono normal type team, where every pokemon is relating to sound.
eh, maybe, but meh. i perfer gardevoir, it kinda resembles sona slightly
You could always go with a lower level team with a kirlia, audino, jigglypuff, and be full fairy.

nice,

ill change it to theme
yah its hard to find a cohesive theme in a single typing unless youre like nami.
